languages.text: "Логово культистов, что устроили пародию на правосудие... Но одно у них не отнять — они и правда готовы умереть за Императора".

traits.locale_text: "Логово культистов, что устроили пародию на правосудие... Но одно у них не отнять — они и правда готовы умереть за Императора".

languages.text: "The den of the cultists who have made a parody of justice... Their sole redeeming quality is that they are really ready to die for the Emperor."
languages.original_text: "Логово культистов, что устроили пародию на правосудие... Но одно у них не отнять — они и правда готовы умереть за Императора".

traits.locale_text: "The den of the cultists who have made a parody of justice... Their sole redeeming quality is that they really are ready to die for the Emperor."
"The den of the cultists who have made a parody of justice... Their sole redeeming quality is that they really are ready to die for the Emperor."
"The den of the cultists who have made a parody of justice... Their sole redeeming quality is that they really are ready to die for the Emperor."

"The den of the cultists who have made a parody of justice... Their sole redeeming quality is that they are really ready to die for the Emperor."
"The den of the cultists who have made a parody of justice... Their sole redeeming quality is that they are really ready to die for the Emperor."

languages.text: 「正義を嘲るかのような茶番を演じる、あのカルト信者どもの巣窟…唯一評価できるのは、奴らが本当に皇帝陛下のために命を捧げる覚悟を持っているという点だけだ」
languages.original_text: "The den of the cultists who have made a parody of justice... Their sole redeeming quality is that they are really ready to die for the Emperor."

traits.locale_text: 「正義を嘲るかのような茶番を演じる、あのカルト信者どもの巣窟…唯一評価できるのは、奴らが本当に皇帝陛下のために命を捧げる覚悟を持っているという点だけだ」

languages.text: "Die Höhle der Kultisten, die die Gerechtigkeit pervertiert haben ... Ihre einzige gute Eigenschaft ist, dass sie wirklich bereit sind, für den Imperator zu sterben."
languages.original_text: "The den of the cultists who have made a parody of justice... Their sole redeeming quality is that they are really ready to die for the Emperor."

traits.locale_text: "Die Höhle der Kultisten, die die Gerechtigkeit pervertiert haben ... Ihre einzige gute Eigenschaft ist, dass sie wirklich bereit sind, für den Imperator zu sterben."

languages.text: « L'antre des cultistes qui s'adonnent à une caricature de la justice... La seule chose qui les rachète à mes yeux, c'est qu'ils sont prêts à mourir pour l'Empereur. »
languages.original_text: "The den of the cultists who have made a parody of justice... Their sole redeeming quality is that they are really ready to die for the Emperor."

traits.locale_text: « L'antre des cultistes qui s'adonnent à une caricature de la justice... La seule chose qui les rachète à mes yeux, c'est qu'ils sont prêts à mourir pour l'Empereur. »

languages.text: «El cubil de los sectarios que han hecho una parodia de justicia... La única cualidad que los redime es que están dispuestos a morir por el Emperador».
languages.original_text: "The den of the cultists who have made a parody of justice... Their sole redeeming quality is that they are really ready to die for the Emperor."

traits.locale_text: «El cubil de los sectarios que han hecho una parodia de justicia... La única cualidad que los redime es que están dispuestos a morir por el Emperador».

languages.text: “这就是那些邪教徒的巢穴，他们遵从着扭曲的正义……他们唯一的可取之处，恐怕也只是他们确实愿意为了帝皇献出生命。”
languages.original_text: "The den of the cultists who have made a parody of justice... Their sole redeeming quality is that they are really ready to die for the Emperor."

traits.locale_text: “这就是那些邪教徒的巢穴，他们遵从着扭曲的正义……他们唯一的可取之处，恐怕也只是他们确实愿意为了帝皇献出生命。”

languages.text: "Adaletle alay eden tarikatçıların yuvası... Sahiden de İmparator uğruna ölmeye hazır oldukları için paçayı kurtarıyorlar."
languages.original_text: "The den of the cultists who have made a parody of justice... Their sole redeeming quality is that they are really ready to die for the Emperor."

traits.locale_text: "Adaletle alay eden tarikatçıların yuvası... Sahiden de İmparator uğruna ölmeye hazır oldukları için paçayı kurtarıyorlar."

languages.original_text: "The den of the cultists who have made a parody of justice... Their sole redeeming quality is that they really are ready to die for the Emperor."
